results.title: Baccalaureate Results
results.congratulations: Congratulations! You have passed the baccalaureate exam.
results.notAdmitted: Unfortunately, you did not pass the baccalaureate exam this time.

calculationDetails.continuousControls: Calculated as average of Semester 1 ({{s1}}) and Semester 2 ({{s2}}) = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.economicsRegional: Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 3 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 {{#mis}}+ MIS ({{mis}}) * 1{{/mis}} {{#law}}+ Law ({{law}}) * 1{{/law}} / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.mathRegional: Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 4 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 {{#trans}}+ Translation ({{trans}}) * 2{{/trans}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.traditionalRegional: French ({{fr}}) * 3 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * {{hgCoef}} + Math ({{math}}) * 1 + Documentation ({{doc}}) * 1 {{#ling}}+ Linguistics ({{ling}}) * 2{{/ling}} {{#faraid}}+ Faraid ({{faraid}}) * 2{{/faraid}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.appliedArtsRegional: Math ({{math}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 4 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 {{#itGeo}}+ IT & Geography ({{itGeo}}) * 2{{/itGeo}} {{#visualArts}}+ Visual Arts ({{visualArts}}) * 2{{/visualArts}} / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}

scienceNational.agricultural: Math ({{math}}) * 7 + Physics-Chemistry ({{pc}}) * 5 + SVT ({{svt}}) * 5 + Plant/Animal ({{plantAnimal}}) * 5 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / 26 = {{avg}}

calculationDetails.economicsNational: Math ({{math}}) * 4 + Accounting ({{account}}) * {{accountCoef}} + General Economics ({{genEcon}}) * {{genEconCoef}} + Economics ({{econ}}) * {{econCoef}} + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.mathNational: Math ({{math}}) * 9 + Physics-Chemistry ({{pc}}) * 7 {{#svt}}+ SVT ({{svt}}) * 3{{/svt}} {{#eng}}+ Engineering ({{eng}}) * 3{{/eng}} + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / {{coefSum}} = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.appliedArtsNational: Product Design ({{product}}) * 5 + Multimedia Design ({{multimedia}}) * 8 + Environmental Design ({{env}}) * 5 + English ({{en}}) * 2 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 / 22 = {{avg}}
calculationDetails.finalAverage: Continuous Controls ({{continuous}}) + Regional Exam ({{regional}}) + National Exam ({{national}}) = {{value}}
calculationDetails.independentTraditionalIslamicRegional: French ({{fr}}) * 3 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 + Math ({{math}}) * 1 + Documentation ({{doc}}) * 1 + Linguistics ({{ling}}) * 2 + Faraid ({{faraid}}) * 2 {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentAppliedArtsRegional: Math ({{math}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 4 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 {{#itGeo}}+ IT & Geography ({{itGeo}}) * 2{{/itGeo}} {{#visualArts}}+ Visual Arts ({{visualArts}}) * 2{{/visualArts}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentScienceRegional: French ({{fr}}) * 4 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} {{#trans}}+ Translation ({{trans}}) * 2{{/trans}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentEconomicsRegional: Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 3 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 {{#mis}}+ MIS ({{mis}}) * 1{{/mis}} {{#law}}+ Law ({{law}}) * 1{{/law}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentMathRegional: Arabic ({{ar}}) * 2 + French ({{fr}}) * 4 + Islamic ({{isl}}) * 2 + History-Geography ({{hg}}) * 2 {{#trans}}+ Translation ({{trans}}) * 2{{/trans}} {{#sport}}+ Sport ({{sport}}) * 1{{/sport}} / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentAppliedArtsNational: Product Design ({{product}}) * 5 + Multimedia Design ({{multimedia}}) * 8 + Environmental Design ({{env}}) * 5 + English ({{en}}) * 2 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 / 22
calculationDetails.independentAgriculturalNational: Math ({{math}}) * 7 + Physics-Chemistry ({{pc}}) * 5 + SVT ({{svt}}) * 5 + Plant/Animal ({{plantAnimal}}) * 5 + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / 26
calculationDetails.independentEconomicsNational: Math ({{math}}) * 4 + Accounting ({{account}}) * {{accountCoef}} + General Economics ({{genEcon}}) * {{genEconCoef}} + Economics ({{econ}}) * {{econCoef}} + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / {{coefSum}}
calculationDetails.independentMathNational: Math ({{math}}) * 9 + Physics-Chemistry ({{pc}}) * 7 {{#svt}}+ SVT ({{svt}}) * 3{{/svt}} {{#eng}}+ Engineering ({{eng}}) * 3{{/eng}} + Philosophy ({{philo}}) * 2 + English ({{en}}) * 2 / {{coefSum}}
